---
title: "CredentialsDict"
description: "Dictionary type for storing login credentials"
---



At least one of email or username must be provided, but not both.
Password is required. MFA secret is optional.


## Parameters

<ParamField path="email" type="Any">
  The email address used for login. Cannot be used with username.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="username" type="Any">
  The username used for login. Cannot be used with email.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="password" type="Any">
  The password for the account. Required.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="mfa_secret" type="Any">
  Optional MFA/2FA secret key for generating one-time codes.
</ParamField>

## Inheritance

Inherits from: dict


## Module

`notte_core.credentials.base`
